patch.name: patch
text: returns the latest changes to a hero in dota from the latest balance patch.
using ``patch <hero>`` alone will return the changes from the latest patch,
while using ``patch <version> <hero>`` will return the changes from that spec
ific patch (currently only down to version 6.79).

talents.name: talents
text: returns the current talents of a requested hero. alias:
`talent`

ability.name: ability
text: returns info about a hero's ability.
there are multiple aliases for abilites, you can discover them all
simply by using commands! supplying a hero is not required. aliases:
`skill` `spell`

wiki.name: wiki
text: returns the dota 2 wiki link for a specified hero.

list.name: list
text: returns a list of all the patches in the database that a hero recieved changes in.

register.name: register
register.usage: register <steam profile, dotabuff link or opendota link
text: register your steam profile with the bot. accepts a steam profile link or a

dotabuff/opendota link.
the bot account will send you a friend request on steam
along with a direct message on discord with instructions.

playerinfo.name: playerinfo
text: returns some basic player info for a specified person. accepts
a dotabuff or opendota link, as well as a username mention (if that user
has their profile linked.)

info.name: info
text: returns some info about the bot. aliases:
`about` `invite`

botstats.name: botstats
text: returns some stats about the bot.

help.name: help
text: return list of help topics, or specific help about a topic.

admin prefix.name: admin prefix
text: change the server specific prefix (note: will still respond to `--`)

admin cooldowns.name: admin cooldowns
admin cooldowns.usage: admin cooldowns <channel or member> <time in seconds>
text: sets the cooldowns for the entire guild for members or channels. for example: if the channel cooldown is 10,
10 seconds must pass before a new command is processed. all commands in between the time of the first command and

any new commands are ignored. 

recommended cooldowns: 10 seconds for member and 5 seconds for channel. 
default cooldowns: 0.
